name: Solar Order
description:
Seems like there are too many planets in this system. Can you keep them under control?

Use mouse to drag planets from one orbit to another.

You can try to pass all the levels or challange yourself for an endless mode.

For those who're here to rate: It might be buggy, i have no idea how to fix it (if you do - you're my hero, seriously). So, I'd love to hear comments on graphics and UI and whether you think the idea worth remaking the game from the scrath in hopes that bugs will go away. Thank you!
